alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 17 at 1:51AM MDT until October 17 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down tree limbs and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult due to sudden strong crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes portions of US191 from Big Timber to Harlowton.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
